This book is by Geoffrey Archer (born 1944) often confused with Jeffrey Archer (born 1940) one-time British politician, jailbird and prolific author. The real Geoffrey Archer is rarer and this book is the first I have been able to lay my hands on.

Scorpion Trail Warning!!! Some adult content
